Ideation

class babydragon.apps.auto_perspective.perspective.Ideation[source]
Parameters:

memory_index (MemoryIndex) –

retrieve_ideas(queries, k=30, max_tokens=10000)[source]

Generate ideas based on the given list of queries.

Parameters:

  • queries (Dict) – The list of queries for generating ideas.

  • k (int) – The number of top search results to consider.

  • max_tokens (int) – The maximum number of tokens to return.

Returns:

A list of ideas generated based on the queries.
